queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'bff-server' of kind 'Deployment' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/etc/localtime' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'bff-server' of kind 'Deployment' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/etc/localtime' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'kube-oidc-proxy' of kind 'Deployment' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/log/apiserver/audit' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'kube-oidc-proxy' of kind 'Deployment' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/log/apiserver/audit' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{iam-provider}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{bff-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{bff-server}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{iam-controller}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{bff-server-session-redis}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{redis}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{resource-view-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{viewer}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{capsule-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{oidc-server}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubebb.oidc-server}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubebb.oidc-server}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubebb.oidc-server}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubebb.oidc-server}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.volumeMounts.name={{apiserver-audit}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{oidc-server}}.volumeMounts.name={{tls}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{oidc-server}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{bff-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{bff-server}}.volumeMounts.name={{portal-global-configs-volume}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{bff-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{bff-server}}.volumeMounts.name={{bff-server-config-volume}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'bff-server' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/etc/localtime' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'bff-server' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/etc/localtime' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'kube-oidc-proxy' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/log/apiserver/audit' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'kube-oidc-proxy' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/log/apiserver/audit' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{oidc-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{iam-controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{iam-provider}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{bff-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{bff-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{bff-server-session-redis}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{redis}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{capsule-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{resource-view-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{viewer}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

Roles or ClusterRoles with the permission 'impersonate' allow subjects to assume the rights of other users, groups, or service accounts. In case of compromise, attackers may abuse this sudo-like functionality to achieve privilege escalation

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{t7d.io.resource-view-controller}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{t7d.io.resource-view-controller}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{resource-view-controller}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{bff-server-session-redis}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{bff-server}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{capsule-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{t7d.io.resource-view-controller}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

queries.query_name: Cluster Admin Rolebinding With Superuser Permissions
queries.description: Ensure that the cluster-admin role is only used where required (RBAC)

files.expected_value: Resource name 'kubebb.capsule-manager-rolebinding' of kind 'ClusterRoleBinding' isn't binding 'cluster-admin' role with superuser permissions
files.actual_value: Resource name 'kubebb.capsule-manager-rolebinding' of kind 'ClusterRoleBinding' is binding 'cluster-admin' role with superuser permissions

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{oidc-server}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{oidc-server}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kube-oidc-proxy}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kube-oidc-proxy}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kube-oidc-proxy}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{capsule-controller-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{manager}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{capsule-controller-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{manager}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{iam-provider}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{iam-provider}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{resource-view-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{viewer}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{iam-controller}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{oidc-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{iam-controller}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{bff-server-session-redis}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{redis}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{bff-server-session-redis}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{redis}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{bff-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{bff-server}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{bff-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{bff-server}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

metadata.name={{oidc-server}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
